code-runner.executorMap.c: cd $dir && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$sub = Split-Path -Leaf (Get-Location).Path; $out = Join-Path '..\bin' $sub; if (-not (Test-Path $out)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $out | Out-Null }; gcc -fexec-charset=GBK '$fileName' -o (Join-Path $out '$fileNameWithoutExt.exe'); & (Join-Path $out '$fileNameWithoutExt.exe')"
